SUPPORT_TICKET.TITLE: Open Support Ticket
SUPPORT_TICKET.SUBJECT: Subject
SUPPORT_TICKET.COMMUNICATION_EXCEPTION: Ticket submission failed because of connection problems to Zerto support server. To submit a ticket now, visit Zerto support portal and log your case there, or try again later.
SUPPORT_TICKET.SUCCESS: Ticket #{0} was successfully created and sent to Zerto support. The team will process it and contact you. If you need to send logs to Zerto, follow the instructions here.
SUPPORT_TICKET.ABORTED: The ticket was submitted because the submission started before the cancel button was pressed.
SUPPORT_TICKET.INVALID_EMAIL: Case submission failed because the Support Portal user is not valid or not authorized. Please make sure you are using a valid support user. If you don't have a valid user please create one on Zerto login request If you still have issue submitting a case please log a case in the MyZerto Support Center
SUPPORT_TICKET.NO_LICENSE: You do not have a valid license to submit a ticket. Contact Zerto support.
SUPPORT_TICKET.DEFAULT_ERROR: An error has occurred during ticket submission. Contact Zerto support.
SUPPORT_TICKET.QUESTION: Question
SUPPORT_TICKET.SSP_MAIL_TOOLTIP: Your email address contains invalid characters or empty
